fieldUpdates.formula: IF((ISNULL( Survey_Question__r.Question_Number__c )),"",Survey_Question__r.CS_Survey_Question_Key__c &'_'& TEXT( Ordering__c ) & '_' & TEXT( YEAR( DATEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( MONTH( DATEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( DAY( DATEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( HOUR( TIMEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( MINUTE( TIMEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( SECOND( TIMEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ))
fieldUpdates.name: Survey Choice Auto Key

rules.fullName: CS Survey Choice Auto Stamp key
